actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain financial assistance furnished to State-insured financial institutions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of financial institutions amounts of money or other property received from the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation or from any State deposit insurance agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain financial assistance furnished to State-insured financial institutions.
